feed.title: [patch] Switching Bitcoin Core to sqlite db

entry.title: [patch] Switching Bitcoin Core to sqlite db
entry.summary: The Bitcoin project is currently researching alternatives to the unmaintained leveldb database. As part of this effort, an implementation to replace leveldb with sqlite has been initiated by jgarzik on GitHub. The code builds successfully, but requires additional work before passing tests. The goal is to find a maintained and reliable alternative to leveldb.
